title: Accounts Payable Intern
description: Process vendor invoices and manage accounts payable transactions. Assist in month-end closing procedures and financial reconciliation activities. Learn about accounting software and help maintain accurate financial records.

title: Tax Advisory Intern
description: Support tax preparation and compliance activities for individual and corporate clients. Learn about tax regulations and assist in tax planning strategies. Help prepare tax returns and maintain client documentation.

title: Financial Analyst Intern
description: Analyze financial statements and prepare variance analysis reports for management review. Support budget preparation and forecasting activities. Assist in financial modeling and investment analysis for capital expenditure decisions.

title: Cost Accounting Intern
description: Calculate product costing and analyze manufacturing overhead allocations. Support standard costing procedures and variance analysis. Assist in inventory valuation and cost control initiatives for production departments.

title: Audit Intern
description: Support external audit procedures including financial statement review and compliance testing. Assist in internal audit activities and control testing procedures. Learn about audit documentation and regulatory reporting requirements.

title: Treasury Management Intern
description: Support cash flow management and foreign exchange hedging activities. Assist in bank relationship management and investment portfolio monitoring. Learn about interest rate risk management and liquidity planning.

title: Management Accounting Intern
description: Prepare management reports and performance dashboards for business units. Support profitability analysis and cost center reporting. Assist in transfer pricing documentation and intercompany reconciliation activities.
